pageContext.claim: “Even President Ronald Reagan tried for 8 years to build a Border Wall, or Fence, and was unable to do so. Others also have tried. We will get it done, one way or the other!”
pageContext.analysis: This is a very strange claim made by Trump. There is no evidence that Reagan considered a wall or fence, according to officials in his administration. “Rather than talking about putting up a fence, why don't we work out some recognition of our mutual problems, make it possible for them to come here legally with a work permit,” Reagan said during a 1980 debate. “And then while they're working and earning here, they pay taxes here. And when they want to go back they can go back.”
